original_title: Curse of the Lesbian Love Goddess
overview: An ancient fertility statuette is uncovered at the beach, and it turns out to have a very strange and mystical power... it makes women horny, very horny!!! It causes women to lose their jobs, bars to close early, and best of all, causes B Movie Horror Scream Queen Linnea Quigley (Return of the Living Dead, etc.) to perform in her first X-Rated Film. Watch for the perfect surprise ending to a hot horny story
title: Curse of the Lesbian Love Goddess
